main.name: Ngwu Stephen
main.description: I design, create, and maintain computer software.
main.bio: I am a software developer from Nigeria. I have a passion for programming and have been working as a software developer for over 3 years. I am skilled in multiple programming languages and have experience working on a variety of platforms. I am a creative problem solver and enjoys working on challenging projects. I am also a good communicator and enjoys working with others to develop innovative solutions.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for your software. And I am also open for remote jobs and gigs.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developing and engineering frontend and backend based solutions. Developed smart contract for accepting ETH payments

testimonials.text: Stephen is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his problem solving skill really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Working with Stephen has been AWESOME, he makes work so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
